channel.title: Lego Reviews on KC Lego
channel.description: Recent content in Lego Reviews on KC Lego

item.title: Mickey Mouse Lego
item.description: Linus supports Rust in Linux development; COSMIC Alpha 6 adds features like zooming and snapping windows; Fedora faces a potential threat from OBS; GNOME may phase out its foot logo based on Cassidy’s article; PewDiePie highlights Linux Mint in his video, while the Pomera D250 offers a minimalist writing device.
